description: Schema for storing provisional classification data for Variant Curation
title: Provisional_variant

___approvalReviewDate.description: Date when the classification approval was reviewed
___approvalReviewDate.title: Approval Review Date

___approvalSubmitter.description: Curator who entered the approved classification
___approvalSubmitter.title: Approval Submitter

___provisionalSubmitter.description: Curator who entered the provisional approval
___provisionalSubmitter.title: Provisional Submitter

___publishDate.description: Date when the classification was published
___publishDate.title: Date Published

___provisionalReviewDate.description: Date when the provisional classification was reviewed
___provisionalReviewDate.title: Provisional Review Date

___publishAffiliation.description: Affiliation that published the classification (if different than the 'associated' one)
___publishAffiliation.title: Publish Affiliation

___classificationStatus.description: Flag to mark the classification status
___classificationStatus.title: Classification Status

___publishClassification.description: Boolean value for whether the approved classification has been published to the portal
___publishClassification.title: Publish Classification

___evidenceSummary.description: Evidence summary for the variant interpretation
___evidenceSummary.title: Evidence Summary

___provisionalDate.description: Date when the classification was saved as provisional
___provisionalDate.title: Date Provisioned

___associatedInterpretationSnapshots.description: List of associated snapshots of this classification
___associatedInterpretationSnapshots.title: Associated Snapshots

___affiliation.description: The affiliation this classification is associated with.
___affiliation.title: Affiliation

___approvedClassification.description: Boolean value for whether the classification has been approved
___approvedClassification.title: Approved Classification

___provisionedClassification.description: Boolean value for whether the classification has been saved as provisional
___provisionedClassification.title: Provisioned Classification

___approvalDate.description: Date when the classification was saved as approved
___approvalDate.title: Approval Date

___classificationDate.description: Date when the classification was last created/saved
___classificationDate.title: Classification Date
